mods.abstract: Page 110 of the album includes three photographs.; Photograph 1 [22] shows an oversize sugar beet sample with greens intact at the Experiment Station. Produce framed by a folded ruler used to illustrate scale.; Photograph 2 [51] shows a sugar beet root and folded ruler used to illustrate scale.; Photograph 3 [52] shows two stock sugar beets at the Experiment Station. A folded ruler and pair of hands holding an oversize beet help to illustrate scale.
mods.note: Photograph 3 was published in the following journal. Dodson, W.R. (1915, June) The Best Crops to Grow for Hogs. Extension Circular, No. 3, p. 42. Photograph is captioned, "Stock Beets on Experiment Station."

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
